recommendations.title: PRE ROLL: BELOW CATEGORY AVERAGE
recommendations.detail: Margin (37.0%) is 11 pts below PRE ROLL average. Ranked #2 of 46. Strong case for cost negotiation.
recommendations.action: Request 6% cost reduction or evaluate alternative PRE ROLL brands.

recommendations.title: CATEGORY BENCHMARK GAP
recommendations.detail: Overall margin (47.5%) trails FLOWER average (53.8%) by 6.3 pts.
recommendations.action: Negotiate cost reduction or increase retail price.

recommendations.title: HIGH PROMOTION DEPENDENCY
recommendations.detail: Only 23% sells at full price. Heavy discounting required.
recommendations.action: Test reducing deal frequency — track velocity without promos.

recommendations.title: VOLUME LEVERAGE
recommendations.action: Use volume as leverage in next vendor meeting.
